message.body: Julia! It has been a long time. I am back. Things have been kinda shitty but everything is starting to come together. When are you in the city again?
Tomorrow! Tues/wed/thurs usually, great for happy houring. Beer sometime?? Glad to hear things are falling into place a bit.
99% locked a new gig in olde citye.
Ok. I'm around tomorrow or like all days now.
Congrats, doing what?? So I ended up not in the city today due to a gas leak that halted all trains this morning. See you one day next week perhaps?
Making games for Sega. And yeah I'll be around next week. Just let me know.
Dude. You gotta invent the next sonic??
Anyway awesome! Check you next week.
